column4: It is useful to have backups, but I was waiting for hard disk prices to go down a bit.
for vital things, you can use stuff like dropbox or a git repository; and i'm quite sure you could drop your word on uni's servers
I've never used cloud storage before, and the uni's backup was too old, as the projects were new. I'll give dropbox a try.
no but you could drop your stuff on unis server the time to upgrade
